SUMMARY:
Merge machine and distro options to create a basic machine task/package
${DISTRO} extras
${MACHINE} extras
Extra packages required to fully support ${MACHINE} hardware
Keyboard support
PCI bus support
ACPI support
APM support
ext2 filesystem support
FAT filesystem support
ALSA sound support
PC card slot support
Bluetooth support
USB gadget support
USB host support
PPP dial-up protocol support
IPSEC support
WiFi support
Near Field Communication support
Cellular data support
SMB network filesystem support
cramfs filesystem support
NFS network filesystem support
Zeroconf support
IPv6 support
Serial port support
Cellular telephony (voice) support
